Introduction

Lee Hong Bin is a South Korean Singer and Actor under Jellyfish Entertainment. He is best known as the Lead Rapper, Vocalist, Visual, and Face of the Boy Group VIXX. He acted in the dramas: Glorious Day (2014), Moorim School (2014), Witch's Love (2018), and the smile has left your eyes (2018).
On 7 August 2020, his departure from VIXX & Jellyfish Entertainment was announced following the controversy of his drunken livestream on Twitch.

Fun facts

1
Hongbin was street-casted by SM several times but he chose to be trainee at Jellyfish because of Park Hyo Shin.
…
2
Hongbin used to be a young monk and lived on a buddhist temple.
…
3
Hongbin was inspired to become a singer after watching a guy perform on a singing competition. He met that guy again in Jellyfish Entertainment where they debuted in the same group. The guy turned out to be Ken.
…
4
Hongbin hates aegyo.
